name: Parvaneh: Legacy of the Light's Guardians
name_original: Parvaneh: Legacy of the Light's Guardians
description:
Developed by Iranian based Bearded Bird, ParVaNeh: Legacy of the Light's Guardians is an action-adventure game set in the fantasy World of Naria.

Fadia, a young and courageous boy sets about protecting ‘Naria, his home village, from the Khazdaks who are trying to pollute their river... As the adventure unfolds, Fadia begins to discover where the Khazdaks have come from and why they have arrived.
